item.title: How to be social in the terminal
item.author: Author
item.description: Online social networks Whoever knows me personally is aware that I am not the biggest fan of social networks. Don’t get me wrong, I was always involved with them. Understanding social networks was also part of my research interests for a quite long time. But my relationship with them was always a love and hate one. In this blog, I’m going to talk a lot about this relationship. In this post, though I will diverge from this discussion.
